Perceptor:

Perceptor Growled while he recived some slashes, quickly he 
transformed to his trasnmetal beast mode (a mole)and her quickly 
started to dig.  Soon he was underground.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He lay flat on his back as he watched the shots pass 
harmlessly over 
> him.  Quickly springing to his feet he stashes his blaster and 
charges 
> pulling two diamond edged scimitars from their sheaths at his 
sides.  He 
> begins an intricate attack pattern of thrusts and slashes at 
Perceptor, his 
> blades a barely visible shimmer as they dance in front of him.
